title: A Wizard’s Secret - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Mystery   Sci-fi   Seinen   Supernatural
tags: Academy   Alchemy   Artificial Intelligence   Beasts   Biochip   Calm Protagonist   Cautious Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Gods   Hidden Abilities   Human Experimentation   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Polygamy   Poor to Rich   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Sword And Magic   Time Skip   Transmigration   Underestimated Protagonist   Wars   Weak to Strong   Wizards
author: Shadow On The Moon
description: Anyone who could construct a stable Spell Model could become a Wizard — that was the Wizards’ ultimate secret! Having been given a new life as the son of an aristocrat and armed with a super quantum computer from his past life, Spell Models came as easily as breathing to Merlin. With this overwhelmingly huge advantage, would Merlin become the greatest Grand Wizard of all time?>
